author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION ONE-C FORMS WELL TO THE SOUTHEAST OF THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS...
summary: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION ONE-C FORMS WELL TO THE SOUTHEAST OF THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS... As of 11:00 PM HST Sat Jul 26 the center of One-C was located near 10.9, -145.6 with movement W at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1009 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION ONE-C FORMS WELL TO THE SOUTHEAST OF THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS... As of 11:00 PM HST Sat Jul 26 the center of One-C was located near 10.9, -145.6 with movement W at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1009 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Depression One-C (CP1/CP012025)
